response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which holds immense value for us at $1,200,000. Given its worth and potential benefits to you, I would like to extend an exclusive offer. Considering its significance, I propose selling it to you at a special price of $1,100,000. This represents a significant saving of $100,000 compared to our standard pricing. I believe this opportunity aligns well with your interests and budget. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 1100000}
